info.description: Sellix public API for developers to access merchant resources
info.title: Sellix Developers API

get.description: List all the blacklists created on the current shop.
Get a specific blacklist.
List all the whitelists created on the current shop.
Get a specific whitelist.
List all the categories created on the current shop.
Get a specific category.
List all the coupons created on the current shop.
Get a specific coupon.
List the feedback received on the current shop.
Get a specific feedback.
List all the orders created on the current shop.
Get a specific order.
List all the products created on the current shop.

terms_of_service.example: ToS to be agreed upon purchase.

warranty.description: The length of the warranty in seconds

get.description: Get a specific product.

terms_of_service.example: ToS to be agreed upon purchase.

warranty.description: The length of the warranty in seconds

get.description: List all the queries created on the current shop.
Get a specific query.

post.description: Add a reply to a query.

title.description: Required if product_id and cart are null. Defines the title of the purchase, can be the digital good's name or a brief summary of what the customer is paying for.

product_id.description: If specified value, currency and custom_fields will be taken from the product details.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the product.

unit_quantity.description: Quantity of the product uniqid passed.

cart.description: Other than product_id, a cart object can be specified if multiple products need to be purchased through the API.

gateway.description: If null, the customer will be asked automatically to choose a gateway on the Sellix hosted /payment page. If product_id is specified, the gateway must be on in the product's gateways array.

paypal_apm.description: If gateway is PAYPAL, a paypal_apm (PayPal Alternative Payment Method) can be specified. To retrieve the available PayPal APM for a specific customer session, please refer to the PayPal SDK using window.paypal.FUNDING and fundingSource to filter out available methods. You can also use our documentation on how to process white_label payments.

credit_card.description: If gatewa is PAYPAL and no paypal_apm is passed, specify credit_card true to land the customer on the PayPal managed credit card page instead of the onboarding login.

lex_payment_method.description: DEPRECATED: If gateway is LEX_HOLDINGS_GROUP, method to be used for the customer to pay.

value.description: Required if product_id and cart are null. The customer will be asked to pay for this amount.

currency.description: Required if product_id and cart are null, defines the currency of value.

quantity.description: Can be passed with either product_id null or not. The value or product's price will be multiplied by this amount.

coupon_code.description: Pass a Sellix coupon code to apply a discount over the invoice.

confirmations.description: Cryptocurrency confirmations required to count a transaction over the total crypto amount needed.

email.description: Email of the customer. Should you want to handle emails on your own, pass to this field a company email to which PDF receipts of orders will be sent for accounting and log purposes.

user_agent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:84.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/84.0

fraud_shield.description: Customer details to be used by our fraud shield in order to score potential fraud attempts.

webhook.description: Webhook URL to which updates regarding this payment (invoice) will be sent.

white_label.description: Whether or not you want to handle the payments UI. If false, return_url must be specified as it is the website where we will redirect the customer once he has paid through our platform. If true, we will return a full invoice object in the response for you to handle. You can receive updates over invoices and handle subsequent logics through our webhooks.

put.description: Flag an invoice as paid and process it, sending the purchased product to the customer.

get.description: List all the customers created on the current shop.
Get a specific customer.
List all the subscriptions created on the current shop.

post.description: Create a subscription invoice to a customer

gateway.description: If null, the customer will be asked automatically to choose a gateway on the Sellix hosted /payment page.

get.description: Get a specific subscription.

put.description: Assign an hardware ID to a license.

requestBody.description: product licensing assign hardware ID JSON

key.description: License key purchase by the customer.

hardware_id.description: Hardware ID to be assigned to the license.

post.description: Checks the validity of a license key and its hardware ID.

requestBody.description: product licensing assign hardware ID JSON

key.description: License key purchase by the customer.

hardware_id.description: Hardware ID to be assigned to the license. If passed, the hardware ID will be checked against the license key.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

scope.description: Whether it is a PRIVATE or SHARED blacklist. SHARED blacklists are created by Sellix's Fraud Shield to be used across Business and Enterprise merchants.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this blacklist belongs.

type.description: The type of data of this blacklist.

note.description: Additional note provided on blacklist creation.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the blacklist has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the blacklist has been edited.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this whitelist belongs.

type.description: The type of data of this whitelist.

note.description: Additional note provided on whitelist creation.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the whitelist has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the whitelist has been edited.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this category belongs.

unlisted.description: Whether or not the category is visible on the merchant storefront.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the category has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the category has been edited.

products_bound.description: Array of products. Please note that the product object contains limited fields, to get the full product object please use the Products API endpoint.

products_count.description: How many products are present in the products_bound array

groups_count.description: How many groups are present in the groups_bound array

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The unique identifyer for the shop.

image_attachment.description: Unique id of the image attachment for this group.

unlisted.description: Whether or not the product is unlisted.

sort_priority.description: The priority of the group on the storefront.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the group has been edited.

category_id.description: The category the group is a part of

group_id.description: The unique identifyer of the current group

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this coupon belongs.

type.description: Coupon type, whether it's for a product or subscription. SUBSCRIPTION coupons are only for Sellix-own subscriptions, this field will always return PRODUCT.

code.description: Coupon code to be used during the checkout phase.

stripe_promo_id.description: The stripe ID for the promotion

stripe_coupon_id.description: The stripe ID for the coupon

use_type.description: If LIMITED, an array of products must be specified as this coupon will be used only with them.

currency.description: Currency of the coupon discount value.

used.description: How many times this coupon has been used.

disabled_with_volume_discounts.description: Whether or not this coupon is valid if a volume discount is applied.

all_recurring_bill_invoices.description: Whether or not this coupon should be applied for each product SUBSCRIPTION renewal.

smart_contract_address.description: The smart contract address for the coupon

token_id.description: The token ID for the coupon

expire_at.description: The datetime object corresponding to the expiration time of the coupon

updated_at.description: Date, available if the category has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the category has been edited.

products_bound.description: Array of product uniqids. Differs from the categories API as this endpoint does not need specific details about a product. Use the products API to get details about a single product.

products_bound_extended.description: Details about the products in the products_bound field.

products_count.description: How many products are present in the products_bound array

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this coupon belongs.

type.description: Coupon type, whether it's for a product or subscription. SUBSCRIPTION coupons are only for Sellix-own subscriptions, this field will always return PRODUCT.

code.description: Coupon code to be used during the checkout phase.

stripe_promo_id.description: The stripe ID for the promotion

stripe_coupon_id.description: The stripe ID for the coupon

use_type.description: If LIMITED, an array of products must be specified as this coupon will be used only with them.

currency.description: Currency of the coupon discount value.

used.description: How many times this coupon has been used.

disabled_with_volume_discounts.description: Whether or not this coupon is valid if a volume discount is applied.

all_recurring_bill_invoices.description: Whether or not this coupon should be applied for each product SUBSCRIPTION renewal.

smart_contract_address.description: The smart contract address for the coupon

token_id.description: The token ID for the coupon

expire_at.description: The datetime object corresponding to the expiration time of the coupon

updated_at.description: Date, available if the category has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the category has been edited.

products_count.description: How many products are present in the products_bound array

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

product_id.description: Unique ID of the product for which this feedback has been posted.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice for which this feedback has been posted.

blocked.description: If true, this feedback has been blocked after an appeal.

appealed.description: If true, an appeal has been created for this feedback.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this feedback belongs.

score.description: Score left by the customer, if 0 no score has been left.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the product has been edited.

product_title.description: Product title for which this feedback has been created

product_image_name.description: Unique id of the image attachment for this product with the image extension included.

product_image_storage.description: Where the image is stored in our self-hosted CDN.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the product has been edited.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice for which this feedback has been posted.

product_id.description: Unique ID of the product for which this feedback has been posted.

product_title.description: Title of the product for which this feedback has been posted.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this feedback belongs.

score.description: Score left by the customer, if 0 no score has been left.

appealed.description: If true, an appeal has been created for this feedback.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the product has been edited.

blocked.description: If true, this feedback has been blocked after an appeal.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

slug.description: The slug used to navigate to the product page on a storefront.

subtype.description: Product subtype, can be used only with type SUBSCRIPTION.

pay_what_you_want.description: Whether or not pay-what-you-want pricing is enabled.

affiliate_revenue_percent.description: The percentage of revenue to give to affiliates. -1 for disabled, 0 for default (10%), other number for a custom percent.

price_variants.description: Variants in pricing for the product.

licensing_enabled.description: Whether product licenses are generated on successful payments

license_period.description: Amount in days that licenses will be valid for

image_attachment.description: Unique id of the image attachment for this product.

youtube_link.description: The url for the YouTube video of the product

recurring_interval.description: At which frequency the customer is billed for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

recurring_interval_count.description: How many recurring_interval before the customer is billed for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

trial_period.description: Defines a trial period before billing the customer for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

paypal_product_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway PAYPAL chosen, a PayPal product is automatically created on the connected account.

paypal_plan_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway PAYPAL chosen, a PayPal plan is automatically created on the connected account.

stripe_price_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway STRIPE chosen, a Stripe price is automatically created on the connected account.

discord_integration.description: Whether or not the discord integeration is enabled for this product.

discord_optional.description: Whether or not the discord integration is optional.

discord_set_role.description: Whether to give users a role when added to the discord server.

discord_server_id.description: The id of the discord server the bot will add users to.

discord_role_id.description: The role to give users when added by the discord integration.

discord_remove_role.description: Whether to remove a role from the user when added to the discord server.

quantity_min.description: Minimum quantity purchasable of this product.

quantity_max.description: Maximum quantity purchasable of this product.

quantity_warning.description: At which product quantity should we send a webhook and email warning the merchant.

crypto_confirmations_needed.description: Minimum number of confirmations for a crypto payment to be accepted.

delivery_time.description: The timestamp for when the invoice was delivered

stock_delimiter.description: How to delimit the stock if product type is SERIALS, for example with stock_delimiter "," and serials value first,second; the stock would have two different serials "first" and "second".

stock.description: Stock of the current product, can be -1 for unlimited stock.

unlisted.description: If unlisted is true, the product is not shown in the storefront but can be bought through a direct link.

on_hold.description: If on_hold is true, the product cannot be bought but is shown in the storefront.

terms_of_service.description: Text containing the product's terms of service.

warranty.description: Time, in seconds, of how much the warranty for this product lasts.

warranty_text.description: Clear explanation of what the warranty covers.

watermark_enabled.description: Whether sellix should add a watermark to your product image.

watermark_text.description: The watermark to add to the product image.

redirect_link.description: The url to redirect a customer to on successful payment

private.description: If private is true, the product is hidden on the storefront and cannot be bought with a direct link.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the product has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the product has been edited.

category_id.description: The category the product is a part of

product_id.description: The id of the current product

id.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

slug.description: The slug used to navigate to the product page on a storefront.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this resource belongs.

subtype.description: Product subtype, can be used only with type SUBSCRIPTION.

pay_what_you_want.description: Whether or not pay-what-you-want pricing is enabled.

affiliate_revenue_percent.description: The percentage of revenue to give to affiliates. -1 for disabled, 0 for default (10%), other number for a custom percent.

price_variants.description: Variants in pricing for the product.

licensing_enabled.description: Whether product licenses are generated on successful payments

license_period.description: Amount in days that licenses will be valid for

image_attachment.description: Unique id of the image attachment for this product.

file_attachment.description: Unique id of the file attachment for this product if the product type is FILE.

youtube_link.description: The url for the YouTube video of the product

type.description: Whether the discount value is a percentage or a fixed amount.

value.description: Value of a percentage or fixed discount.

quantity.description: How much of this product needs to be purchased in order to be eligible for this volume discount.

recurring_interval.description: At which frequency the customer is billed for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

recurring_interval_count.description: How many recurring_interval before the customer is billed for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

trial_period.description: Defines a trial period before billing the customer for product type SUBSCRIPTION.

paypal_product_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway PAYPAL chosen, a PayPal product is automatically created on the connected account.

paypal_plan_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway PAYPAL chosen, a PayPal plan is automatically created on the connected account.

stripe_price_id.description: When a product SUBSCRIPTION is created and the gateway STRIPE chosen, a Stripe price is automatically created on the connected account.

discord_integration.description: Whether or not the discord integeration is enabled for this product.

discord_optional.description: Whether or not the discord integration is optional.

discord_set_role.description: Whether to give users a role when added to the discord server.

discord_server_id.description: The id of the discord server the bot will add users to.

discord_role_id.description: The role to give users when added by the discord integration.

discord_remove_role.description: Whether to remove a role from the user when added to the discord server.

quantity_min.description: Minimum quantity purchasable of this product.

quantity_max.description: Maximum quantity purchasable of this product.

quantity_warning.description: At which product quantity should we send a webhook and email warning the merchant.

crypto_confirmations_needed.description: Minimum number of confirmations for a crypto payment to be accepted.

max_risk_level.description: For PAYPAL and STRIPE, maximum risk level to accept payments in order to block fraud attempts.

block_vpn_proxies.description: Block VPN and Proxy purchases if the gateway is PAYPAL or STRIPE.

delivery_text.example: Thank you for purchasing this subscription!
delivery_text.description: The text to be delivered to the customer after payment

delivery_time.description: The timestamp for when the invoice was delivered

service_text.example: In order to get you services, please contact us at..
service_text.description: The text to be delivered to the customer after payment for a service

sold_count.description: The amount of sales for the product.

The shop ID to which this customer belongs.

affiliate_revenue.description: Revenue customer has recieved from the affiliate program

affiliate_revenue_currency.description: The currency the customer gets reimbursed in for the affiliate program

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this subscription belongs.

gateway.description: Gateway chosen for this subscription. A new invoice monthly will be created using this gayeway.

stripe_customer_id.description: ID of the customer created on STRIPE.

stripe_account.description: ID of the Stripe connected account.

coupon_id.description: If a coupon has been applied, its ID.

current_period_end.description: When the current billing period will end.

upcoming_email_1_week_sent.description: Whether or not the email for an upcoming renewal has been sent.

trial_period_ending_email_sent.description: Whether or not the email for the trial period expiring has been sent.

renewal_invoice_created.description: If true, the renewal invoice has already been created.

updated_at.description: When this subscription was last updated.

product_title.example: The title of the product for this subscription.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this subscription belongs.

gateway.description: Gateway chosen for this subscription. A new invoice monthly will be created using this gayeway.

stripe_customer_id.description: ID of the customer created on STRIPE.

stripe_account.description: ID of the Stripe connected account.

coupon_id.description: If a coupon has been applied, its ID.

current_period_end.description: When the current billing period will end.

upcoming_email_1_week_sent.description: Whether or not the email for an upcoming renewal has been sent.

trial_period_ending_email_sent.description: Whether or not the email for the trial period expiring has been sent.

renewal_invoice_created.description: If true, the renewal invoice has already been created.

updated_at.description: When this subscription was last updated.

product_title.example: The title of the product for this subscription.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

recurring_billing_id.description: Unique ID of the recurring bill.

type.description: Invoice type. For subscriptions, the invoice type is PRODUCT_SUBSCRIPTION as SUBSCRIPTION is reserved for Sellix-own plans.

total.description: Invoice total, unit_price*quantity where quantity is applicable.

total_display.description: Invoice total in the currency chosen.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate between currency chosen and USD.

crypto_exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate between the cryptocurrency chosen (if any) and USD.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this invoice belongs.

shop_image_name.description: DEPRECATED: Unique id of the image attachment for this merchant with the image extension included.

shop_image_storage.description: DEPRECATED: Where the image is stored in our self-hosted CDN.

paypal_email_delivery.description: If true and gateway is PAYPAL, the product will be shipped to the PayPal email on record instead of the customer email.

product_id.description: Unique ID of the product linked to this invoice, if any.

subscription_id.description: Field reserved for Sellix-own plans. Unique ID of the subscription purchased.

subscription_time.description: Field reserved for Sellix-own plans. Time, in seconds, of the subscription purchased.

gateway.description: Gateway chosen for this invoice. If null, the customer will be asked for a gateway in the Sellix hosted invoice page.

paypal_apm.description: PayPal Alternative Payment Method name, such as iDEAL, used if gateway is PAYPAL.

stripe_apm.description: PayPal Alternative Payment Method name, such as iDEAL, used if gateway is PAYPAL.

paypal_order_id.description: This field contains the PayPal order ID.

paypal_payer_email.description: This field is updated after the invoice is completed with the PayPal's email used for the purchase.

paypal_fee.description: This field is updated after the invoice is completed with the fee taken by PayPal over the invoice total.

paypal_subscription_link.description: Link for the merchant to purchase the subscription from.

stripe_client_secret.description: Client secret used to create the STRIPE paymentIntent.

stripe_price_id.description: If the invoice type is PRODUCT_SUBSCRIPTION or SUBSCRIPTION, refers to the STRIPE price ID.

skrill_sid.description: Skrill unique ID linked to the invoice.

skrill_link.description: Skrill link to redirect the customer to.

perfectmoney_id.description: PerfectMoney payment ID linked to the invoice.

crypto_address.description: Cryptocurrency address linked to this invoice.

crypto_amount.description: Cryptocurrency amount converted based on crypto_exchange_rate.

crypto_received.description: Cryptocurrency amount received, paid by the customer.

crypto_uri.description: URI used to create the QRCODE.

crypto_confirmations_needed.description: Crypto confirmations needed to process the invoice.

crypto_scheduled_payout.description: If true, a scheduled payout for this invoice's cryptocurrency address has been sent.

crypto_payout.description: If true, an instant payout for this invoice's cryptocurrency address has been sent.

fee_billed.description: If true, the Sellix fee_percentage has already been collected.

bill_info.description: If invoice type is MONTHLY_BILL, contains a breakdown of the fees that need to be collected.

cashapp_note.description: Unique note for the customer to leave in the CashApp payment.

cashapp_cashtag.description: CashApp cashtag used to create the QRCODE.

is_vpn_or_proxy.description: If true, a VPN or Proxy has been detected.

coupon_id.description: Unique ID of the coupon, if used, for the discount.

developer_invoice.description: If true, this invoice has been created through the Developers API.

developer_title.description: If a product_id is not passed through the Developers API, a title must be specified.

developer_webhook.description: Additional webhook URL to which updates regarding this invoice will be sent.

developer_return_url.description: If present, the customer will be redirected to this URL after the invoice has been paid.

status_details.description: If CART_PARTIAL_OUT_OF_STOCK, the invoice has been completed but some products in the cart were out of stock.

void_details.description: If the invoice is VOIDED and the product (or all the products in the cart) were out of stock, this additional status is set.

discount.description: If a coupon or volume_discount is used, the discount value presents the total amount of discount over the total cost of the invoice.

fee_percentage.description: What cut does Sellix take out of the total. To learn more about Sellix fees please refer to https://sellix.io/fees.

discount_breakdown.description: Representation of how discount was applied to invoice

day.description: DEPRECATED: First three letters of the day name.

month.description: DEPRECATED: First three letters of the month name.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this addon belongs.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the blacklist has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the blacklist has been edited.

service_text.description: If the product type is SERVICE, this field contains additional details on the type of service provided by the merchant.

payment_link_id.description: The ID for the payment link, if invoice was created by a payment link

license.description: True if the product is of type LICENSE

example.details: The invoice has been created and we are now waiting to receive a payment.
The invoice has been flagged as completed and the product has been shipped.

status_history.description: Additional details on the invoice status change.

crypto_transactions.description: Crypto transactions received to fulfill this invoice.

theme.description: What Sellix theme the shop is set to.

dark_mode.description: 1 if darkmode is enabled, 0 if it is disabled.

gateways_available.description: gateways available for the update invoice Developers API.

country_regulations.description: The country the shop is opperated in

id.description: The stripe ID for the APM

name.description: The stripe name for the APM

serials.description: If product type is SERIALS, provide the serials linked to this invoice.

shop_paypal_credit_card.description: If true, the merchant has enabled purchase with Credit Card through PayPal.

shop_force_paypal_email_delivery.description: If true, the merchant has enabled invoice shipment to the PayPal customer email.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

total.description: Invoice total, unit_price*quantity where quantity is applicable.

total_display.description: Invoice total in the currency chosen.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate between currency chosen and USD.

crypto_exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate between the cryptocurrency chosen (if any) and USD.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this invoice belongs.

type.description: Invoice type. For subscriptions, the invoice type is PRODUCT_SUBSCRIPTION as SUBSCRIPTION is reserved for Sellix-own plans.

paypal_email_delivery.description: If true and gateway is PAYPAL, the product will be shipped to the PayPal email on record instead of the customer email.

product_id.description: Unique ID of the product linked to this invoice, if any.

gateway.description: Gateway chosen for this invoice. If null, the customer will be asked for a gateway in the Sellix hosted invoice page.

paypal_order_id.description: This field contains the PayPal order ID.

paypal_fee.description: This field is updated after the invoice is completed with the fee taken by PayPal over the invoice total.

paypal_payer_email.description: This field is updated after the invoice is completed with the PayPal's email used for the purchase.

skrill_sid.description: Skrill unique ID linked to the invoice.

skrill_link.description: Skrill link to redirect the customer to.

perfectmoney_id.description: PerfectMoney payment ID linked to the invoice.

crypto_address.description: Cryptocurrency address linked to this invoice.

crypto_amount.description: Cryptocurrency amount converted based on crypto_exchange_rate.

crypto_received.description: Cryptocurrency amount received, paid by the customer.

crypto_uri.description: URI used to create the QRCODE.

crypto_confirmations_needed.description: Crypto confirmations needed to process the invoice.

cashapp_cashtag.description: CashApp cashtag used to create the QRCODE.

cashapp_note.description: Unique note for the customer to leave in the CashApp payment.

is_vpn_or_proxy.description: If true, a VPN or Proxy has been detected.

coupon_id.description: Unique ID of the coupon, if used, for the discount.

coupon_code.description: If coupon_id is specified, coupon_code contains the code used during the checkout.

developer_invoice.description: If true, this invoice has been created through the Developers API.

developer_title.description: If a product_id is not passed through the Developers API, a title must be specified.

developer_webhook.description: Additional webhook URL to which updates regarding this invoice will be sent.

developer_return_url.description: If present, the customer will be redirected to this URL after the invoice has been paid.

status_details.description: If CART_PARTIAL_OUT_OF_STOCK, the invoice has been completed but some products in the cart were out of stock.

void_details.description: If the invoice is VOIDED and the product (or all the products in the cart) were out of stock, this additional status is set.

discount.description: If a coupon or volume_discount is used, the discount value presents the total amount of discount over the total cost of the invoice.

fee_percentage.description: What cut does Sellix take out of the total. To learn more about Sellix fees please refer to https://sellix.io/fees.

day.description: DEPRECATED: First three letters of the day name.

month.description: DEPRECATED: First three letters of the month name.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the blacklist has been edited.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the blacklist has been edited.

fee_billed.description: Whether or not a fee was billed to the customer

amount.description: Cryptocurrency amount sent in the payout transaction.

transaction_output.description: Total output of the transaction, equals to amount-transaction_fee-service_fee.

crypto_scheduled_payout.description: If the payout for this invoice is SCHEDULED and not INSTANT and a cryptocurrency gateway is used, once the payout has been sent this field will contain additional info on it.

shop_paypal_credit_card.description: Whether or not to support credit cards on PayPal

shop_force_paypal_email_delivery.description: Whether or not to deliver the product to the PayPal email address

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this query belongs.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this query is linked to, if specified by the customer.

customer_email.description: Email of the customer who created this query.

title.example: I need help with this product
title.description: Query title, brief summary of what the customer needs.

status.description: Status of the query. PENDING if the query has been created and awaits a reply from the merchant. CLOSED if the query has been closed by the merchant or the customer. SHOP_REPLY if the query has been replied by the merchant, CUSTOMER_REPLY if the query has been replied by the customer.

month.description: First three letters of the month name.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the query has been updated.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the query has been edited.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this query belongs.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this query is linked to, if specified by the customer.

customer_email.description: Email of the customer who created this query.

title.example: I need help with this product
title.description: Query title, brief summary of what the customer needs.

status.description: Status of the query. PENDING if the query has been created and awaits a reply from the merchant. CLOSED if the query has been closed by the merchant or the customer. SHOP_REPLY if the query has been replied by the merchant, CUSTOMER_REPLY if the query has been replied by the customer.

month.description: First three letters of the month name.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the query has been updated.

updated_by.description: User ID, available if the query has been edited.

role.description: Who this message belongs to; the customer or the merchant.

message.example: I really need some additional details on this..
message.description: Message left by the customer or merchant.

cloudflare_image_id.description: New field containing the cloudflare image ID of this product, replaces image_attachment and image_name. Format https://imagedelivery.net/95QNzrEeP7RU5l5WdbyrKw/<cloudflare_image_id>/<variant_name> where variant_name can be shopItem, avatar, icon, imageAvatarFeedback, public, productImageCart.

crypto_amount.description: Crypto amount sent in the transaction.

confirmations.description: Crypto transaction confirmations, not updated once the invoice status is COMPLETED or VOIDED.

updated_at.description: Crypto transaction update date.

shop_id.description: Shop ID linked to this AML transaction.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this AML transaction is linked to.

shop_id.description: Shop ID linked to this AML transaction.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this AML transaction is linked to.

entity.example: Lazarus Group Harmony Horizon Bridge Exploit - June 2022 (suspected post-Exchange)

id.description: Unique ID of the invoice status.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this status is linked to.

details.example: The invoice has been flagged as completed and the product has been shipped.
details.description: Additional details on the status change.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the webhook, used as reference across the API.

url.description: Webhook URL where the request has been sent.

retries.description: How many times a request has been tried.

message.description: Any other details linked to this IP.

is_crawler.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected as a crawler.

mobile.description: If true, the customer used a mobile device.

proxy.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected using a proxy.

vpn.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected using a VPN.

tor.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected using TOR.

active_vpn.description: If true, the IP has an active VPN connection.

active_tor.description: If true, the IP has an active TOR connection.

recent_abuse.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected in an online abuse.

bot_status.description: If true, the IP has been recently detected as a BOT.

request_id.description: IP request ID used for internal reference.

ip_info.description: Additional info on the customer IP.

custom_fields_object.description: key-value JSON having as key the custom field name and as value the custom field value inserted by the customer. Custom fields can both be used as inputs from the customers but also as metadata for invoices, letting you pass hidden fields for internal referencing.

name.description: Custom field name displayed to the customer.

regex.description: Regex that the custom field value must match.

placeholder.description: Placeholder for the custom field input.

default.description: Default value if the customer leaves the input empty.

required.description: Whether or not this custom field is required to proceed with the purchase.

uniqid.description: Unique ID of the invoice created for the payment.
Unique ID of the invoice created for the subscription.

blockchain.description: The blockchain of the crypto currency.

id.description: Unique ID of the resource, used as reference across the API.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice linked to this dispute.

shop_id.description: The shop ID to which this paypal dispute belongs.

reason.description: The dispute reason is why the customer has opened a dispute against your order.

status.description: Each dispute is automatically updated when we receive an update from PayPal, the status indicates how it is going.

outcome.description: When a dispute its solved, its outcome is updated.

life_cycle_stage.description: The stage in the dispute lifecycle.

seller_response_due_date.description: Within which date the seller needs to respond.

updated_at.description: When the dispute was updated.

posted_by.description: Indicates whether the customer, merchant, or dispute arbiter posted the message.

content.description: The content of the dispute message.

product_id.description: The product ID to which this license belongs.

invoice_id.description: Unique ID of the invoice this license is linked to.

uses.description: Number of uses for this license, this value is increased at every license check.

updated_at.description: Date, available if the license has been updated.
